'''''Mallorn'' 61''' is the sixty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in Winter [[2020]]. 

==Contents==
* '''Cover Art'''
** "Bird and Baby"
*** By: Tamsin Barlow
* '''Editorial'''
** "Looking Ahead, Looking Behind"
*** By: Luke Shelton
* '''Articles'''
** "Tolkien's ''Fantasy Landscape''"
*** By: Nancy Bunting and [[Ruth Lacon|Elizabeth Currie]]
** "Defying and Defining Darkness"
*** By: [[Verlyn Flieger]]
** "Queer Lodgings: Gender and Sexuality in ''The Lord of the Rings'' - Reprinted with New Introduction from the Author"
*** By: David Craig
* '''Notes'''
** "Celebrating 'Queer Lodgings'"
*** By: Robin Anne Reid
** "Oxford, New York City, Paris: The Tolkien Exhibitions 2018-2020"
*** By: [[Marcel Bülles|Marcel Aubron-Bülles]]
** "Tolkien in King's Heath"
*** By: [[Robert S. Blackham|Bob Blackham]]
* '''Reviews'''
** ''The Canons of Fantasy''
*** By: Monica Vazquez
** ''Fantasies of Time and Death: Dunsany, Eddison, and Tolkien''
*** By: Jennifer Rogers
** ''[["Something Has Gone Crack"|"Something Has Gone Crack": New Perspectives on J.R.R. Tolkien in the Great War]]''
*** By: Katherine Sas
** ''[[The Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''
*** By: [[Shaun Gunner]]
** ''Tolkien’s Cosmology: Divine Beings and Middle-earth''
*** By: Kate Neville
* '''Submissions'''
** Letters to the Editor
** Guide for Authors
* '''Inside Art'''
** By: [[Soni Alcorn-Hender]], Tamsin Barlow, [[Jenny Dolfen]], [[Anke Eissmann]], Wenjin Lu, [[Ted Nasmith]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
